title: Good Afternoon, please help about this font: what is name?
content:
please help about this font: what is name?

[http://www.francescoanile.it/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/logo-anile.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193233/http:/www.francescoanile.it/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/logo-anile.png "http://www.francescoanile.it/wp-content/uploads/2011/01/logo-anile.png")

ATTENZIONE: it is white on white background.

sorry but I don't know how to post it in here

thank you very much!!
author: sasotigani

comments.content:
You’ve posted to the OLD type ID board. In future, please post here:  
 [http://typophile.com/typeid](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193233/http:/typophile.com/typeid "http://typophile.com/typeid")

The serif face is Parma Petit, by Manfred Klein:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/parmapetit.font?text=FrancescoAnile](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193233/http:/www.dafont.com/parmapetit.font?text=FrancescoAnile "http://www.dafont.com/parmapetit.font?text=FrancescoAnile")

The hand-written style script is James Fajardo:  
 [http://www.dafont.com/james-fajardo.font?text=unavitadatenore](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317193233/http:/www.dafont.com/james-fajardo.font?text=unavitadatenore "http://www.dafont.com/james-fajardo.font?text=unavitadatenore")

thank you very much, you are so precious!  
:)
